text.data: Leviathan: Where is this...?[end]G
Garuda: What is happening...?[end]V
Valitora: The door to the new era... Has it opened?[end]J
Jormungand: We can go no further...[end]G
Garuda: Can you not see it...? It is our...[end]L
Leviathan: Him...? What is arising...?[end]J
Jormungand: Bahamut. It is him again...[end]V
Valitora: But why...? If things are to continue at this rate...[end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1]: But... [character][0x1] and the others aren't...[end][0x0]

[character][0x1]: Holy Dragons, wait.
Is it my fault? Because I can't become a Dragnar?
Because I'm weak-minded?[end]
Chapter 18 The Promised Land[end]M
Matelite: [character][0x1], tell us! What's happening in the sky?[end]H
Hah! Forget about them!! Those who oppose me shouldn't get to hear what you have to say, [character][0x1]!![end]D
Don't worry about them... I'm almost certain they're watching or listening![end]W
Well? [character][0x1], speak up! Tell us what the Holy Dragons are saying!![end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1]: Matelite, do you remember how the legend of the Holy Dragons goes?[end]M
Matelite: Of course, [character][0x1]! In my own words, it goes something like...[end]T
The Holy Dragons defeat the Granbelos Empire and the new era of Kahna is ushered in!! I think there was more after that, but... Well, anyway, that's how it goes.[end]T

The legend of the Holy Dragons...
The one who can speak with the Holy Dragons shall open the door to a new era... Yes... The door has now been opened...[end]T
That door in the sky is the door to a new era... The Holy Dragons opened it. No, that is, they tried to open it...[end]B
But.. they couldn't... But then... I...[end]M

Matelite: !!! I remember it now, [character][0x1]!! The rest of the legend...
A weak minded person... From the heavens a disaster will fall...[end]H

Hmmm... Door, door, door. Where was there a door...
Hey! Taicho! Prepare for departure![end]T
Taicho: Matelite... You do not seem to understand... Shall I explain it to you?[end]T
Taicho: [character][0x1]! Might the door be that hole in the sky?[end]M
Matelite: Quiet! Taicho! Stop your complaining and leave at once! Everybody, leave![end]Z
Zora: Out of the way! What is it?![end1].
...What was that about?![end1]R
Rush: Yes... That's how! Later, [character][0x1]!![end]R
Rush: Oh no!!! [character][0x1]!! Wait![end]M
Matelite: What's wrong, [character][0x1]? You're acting strange!![end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1]: ......[end]M
Matelite: The door to the new era... It still might not open, right?[end]H
Have you forgotten about our Holy Dragon?[end]B

Bahamut, the guardian dragon of Kahna!!
Until Bahamut wakes up the legend won't be fulfilled![end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1]... Believe!! You mustn't think of yourself as a weak-minded person![end].
...Thank you.[end]B
But... Matelite... It appears that Bahamut is despised by the other Holy Dragons...[end]M
Matelite the Hero![end]M
Matelite the Famous![end]T
Taicho is...[end][0x0]

You're not alone, [character][0x1]! We'll always be together!
If monsters from that other world show up through the door in the sky, we'll protect you from them! That is the way I live! I will never change that![end]M
Matelite: Bwahaha... I wouldn't be surprised! Take a look at me![end]M
Matelite the Knight of Kahna![end]S
Strong people have many enemies... I'm hated by everybody...[end]I
I'm the Bahamut of the human world! And Taicho is...[end]L
Leviathan? Or maybe Jormungand?[end]B
Bahamut's tail!![end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1]... I know... I am an old, fussy man... I talk too much, and am easily flattered... As a knight... as a soldier... I might not be qualified...[end]B
But! I can't leave now! I can't leave it all up to them...[end][character][0x1]

[character][0x1] and Rush... The Freedom Revolutionaries...
They care only of appearances... Only cheap words...
They're right up there with... the Mini-Devils...[end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1]... I have a dream...[end]K
Kahna is revived, and you become the queen... And I am always at your side to serve you![end]H
However... Even I... will become old someday...[end]I
I'll become an old man like Sendak... If I started rambling all the time, I'd think of retiring too... If they'll take my place for me when that happens...[end]I
If they become excellent knights who will serve you, [character][0x1]... I would be happy...[end]B
But, even when that time comes... Even when they become my age... If they want to make Kahna free... I will let them... You will too, certainly...[end]A
And then, I'll retire... By then Sendak will probably be gone...[end]W

When that happens, [character][0x1]... I might want to start rambling about when you were a kid... About the king of Kahna... about this war... Rumors about [character][0x1] and the others... I would like it if you could come and visit me some time, so we can talk...[end]A

And then, I'll ask you to rub my back... To give me a massage... My body will be stiff, you see... My bones will rattle as I walk...
When that times comes, wearing my shining armor, I will say farewell![end]O
Oh, no... I'm already rambling... I'm going to be an old man soon too...[end]O
Okay...! Time to go make fun of Taicho or somebody![end]O

Oh yes, [character][0x1]. One last thing... After I retire... I want you to come to my house alone! Especially, don't bring the new king of Kahna over! Whenever I think of you married to someone, it pains me!! The only one I will ever serve is you, [character][0x1]!![end]I
I've changed a lot since then, haven't I?[end]

Upon listening closely...
You can hear Matelite's laughter...
Bwahahaha...![end][character][0x1]

[character][0x1]: I... We've both worried all the others.
Matelite... [character][0x1]... All the members of the Resistance...[end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1]. I couldn't say this to Matelite, but I have a dream. A small, feeble dream...[end]M
My dream is...[end]N

No, I can't say it.
You see... If I put it into words...
It's like they would melt away into the sky.[end]L
Let's go... Matelite's waiting for us on the bridge.[end][character][0x1]

[character][0x1]: [character][0x1]... Please... Protect the church...
The memories of the people of Kahna and lovers rest there... Unforgotten by time... Memories that must not be lost...
Ours too... Do you still remember our promise...?[end]
It was embarrassing, so I forgot it... I remember![end1][character][0x1]
[character][0x1]: I'm sorry... I want to look at the sky a little more. When I look at the sky... I feel better...[end]S

Sendak: The Holy Dragons are angry... Very intensely, very deeply angry...
Am I shaking?[end]
Ha ha! You're a shaking old geezer! Don't worry about it, Sendak.[end1][character][0x1]
[character][0x1], I am frightened. The Holy Dragons are this angry because I prayed for such odd things...[end]Y

Yet, it does not end... This is the first time I have had this strong of a feeling... The Holy Dragons are in despair... The anger of despair... Anger toward what...? If it is I they are angry at... I... thought only of bad things, that is why...[end]T
Taicho: Sir Matelite... Someday I shall make you weep![end]T
Taicho: Sir Matelite is being silent... All he said was, [0x24]You're the tail...[0x22] He must be planning something...[end]H
Hornet: The sky is angry... I hope nothing bad happens.[end]H

Hornet: I heard the news from [character][0x1]. Kahna at last!
Make sure your preparations are complete! The final battle is near![end]
Wait!! Let's go!![end1]R
Rush: He makes me so mad![end]R
Rush: I don't need your consolation or your excuses. [character][0x1] is... important to me too...[end]T
Truce: [character][0x1]'s about to start...[end]T
Truce: The door to a new era... Did it really open? If it did, then what about those monsters from the other world?[end]B
Bikkebakke: Hey, [character][0x1]... I'm having to do something nasty... Do you hate me for it?[end]
What's wrong? Nah, it just means you're an adult.[end1]T
Thanks, [character][0x1]...[end]W

We're returning to Kahna soon and...
But I just don't have enough... I know it's not something I should be doing... But this is all I CAN do now. I can't help it, that's just the way it is...[end]
Matelite-brand merchandise Book store Mushroom shop[end1]Z
Zora: Come on! If somebody is going to cheer [character][0x1] up, we're better at it than he is![end]L
Lukia: You know, I'll always have faith in [character][0x1]... And in you too, [character][0x1].[end]M

Melodia: They left us out, huh?! I hate that Matelite!
But that's okay! I get to be with you and Hornet!![end]M
Melodia: Hey... What's wrong? Tell me!![end]M
Melodia: It's so weird... Matelite isn't saying anything![end]

The results of the sky reconnaissance:
It has been discovered that in the vicinity of the Church of Memories in Kahna, the monsters from the other world that appeared from the hole in the sky are malevolent.
Presently, in order to protect the Church of Memories, the Granbelos Imperial Army is in a state of war... Furthermore, the whereabouts of the crew member who had gathered this information is unknown.[end]Y
You got a Princest's???.[end][end]
